attributes.action: Stop paying tax on Overtime Pay!
attributes.additional_details: overtime is a choice and should not be linked with your standard pay! I believe it's about time that if we choose to work more as individuals that we should be rewarded with what we have earnt on top of our pay packet. Please sign this to show the people that run this country that we deserve better!!!
attributes.background: I have the argument that tax should not be taken off overtime pay which hard working individuals choose to do just to make life that little bit easier.
